title: Marketplace Money for Friday, May 09, 2014
byline: David Lazarus, Kaitlin Funaro and Nick White
teaser: This week on Marketplace Money, guest host David Lazarus of the LA Times and Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson discuss how Target will keep your information secure — for real this time. Lindsay Gellman tells us when hiring a financial adviser is a good decision. David Lazarus answers questions from listeners. Kiplinger's Kimberly Lankford explains why HSA's can be a good option for saving, Liz Weston gives her best picks for financial gifts for new grads and Celia Rivenbark tells us how her parents changed her relationship with money.
